ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Rick Clark is a resident of Keller, TX, US. He has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 27 years. During his last employment he was working as an ITCM Messaging Unix Administrator at BNSF RAILROAD. Rick has extensive knowledge of Oracle, Apache WEB Server, UNIX, SQL, PC Hardware, VMware, Sun Solaris, NetCool, Linux Red Hat, shell scripting, XML, WebLogic Enterprise Application Server, Oracle PL/SQL, Linux, Jakarta TOMCAT Servlet Engine, DB2, WordPress, Veritas NetBackup, VMS, Ruby, Perl Programming, MySQL, Windows 2008 R2, Secure Socket Layer, QPID, PS, Oracle CM, Oracle Applications, ORACLE OE, Linux RE 5, Jboss, Java, Internet Access, IBM Mainframe Hardware, Enterprise Java Beans, DS1. So far Rick has not gained any managerial experience.
